languages.text: "Разумеется. Но я — старик, слепой на один глаз и еле переставляющий ноги. Я ничего не нашел, но это не значит, что там ничего нет!"
"I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Но я — старик, слепой на один глаз и еле переставляющий ноги. Я ничего не нашел, но это не значит, что там ничего нет!"

traits.locale_text: "I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I didn't find anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing there!"
"I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I didn't find anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing there!"
"I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"
"I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"
"I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"

languages.text: 「もちろん、そういう気持ちを抱いたことはあります。しかし、私は片目が見えず、脚も言うことを効かないような老人です。何も見つけられませんでしたが、だからといって何もないわけではありません！」
languages.original_text: "I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、そういう気持ちを抱いたことはあります。しかし、私は片目が見えず、脚も言うことを効かないような老人です。何も見つけられませんでしたが、だからといって何もないわけではありません！」

languages.text: “我当然试过，可我已经老态龙钟了，一只眼睛瞎了，两条腿也几乎挪不动地方了。我什么都没找到，但这并不意味着那些东西不存在！”
languages.original_text: "I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"

traits.locale_text: “我当然试过，可我已经老态龙钟了，一只眼睛瞎了，两条腿也几乎挪不动地方了。我什么都没找到，但这并不意味着那些东西不存在！”

languages.text: «Por supuesto que sí. Pero soy viejo, estoy ciego de un ojo y apenas puedo mover las piernas. ¡Que no haya encontrado nada nunca no quita que haya artefactos por encontrar!».
languages.original_text: "I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto que sí. Pero soy viejo, estoy ciego de un ojo y apenas puedo mover las piernas. ¡Que no haya encontrado nada nunca no quita que haya artefactos por encontrar!».

languages.text: « Si, bien entendu, mais je ne suis plus qu'un vieux borgne à peine capable de se déplacer. Si je n'ai rien découvert, ça ne signifie pas qu'il n'y a rien à trouver ! »
languages.original_text: "I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"

traits.locale_text: « Si, bien entendu, mais je ne suis plus qu'un vieux borgne à peine capable de se déplacer. Si je n'ai rien découvert, ça ne signifie pas qu'il n'y a rien à trouver ! »

languages.text: "Doch, natürlich. Aber ich bin ein alter Mann, auf einem Auge blind und kaum fähig, die Beine zu bewegen. Ich habe nie etwas gefunden, aber das bedeutet nicht, dass es nichts zu finden gibt!"
languages.original_text: "I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"

traits.locale_text: "Doch, natürlich. Aber ich bin ein alter Mann, auf einem Auge blind und kaum fähig, die Beine zu bewegen. Ich habe nie etwas gefunden, aber das bedeutet nicht, dass es nichts zu finden gibt!"

languages.text: "Çalışmaz olur muyum! Çalıştım tabii. Ne var ki bir gözü kör, bacakları zar zor tutan ihtiyarın tekiyim. Hiçbir şey bulamadım lakin bu ucunda bir şey olmadığı manasına gelmez!"
languages.original_text: "I have, of course. But I'm an old man who is blind in one eye and can barely move his legs. I never found anything, but that doesn't mean there's nothing to find!"

traits.locale_text: "Çalışmaz olur muyum! Çalıştım tabii. Ne var ki ben ihtiyar bir adamım. Bir gözüm görmüyor, bacaklarımı da güç bela hareket ettirebiliyorum. Hiçbir şey bulamamışsam da bulunacak bir şeyler vardır elbet!"
